spell.name: Pass Without Trace
spell.components: V, S, M (ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce)
spell.shortDescription: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage. -
